text: Naples International Airport () is an international airport serving Naples, Italy. It is the fourth busiest airport in Italy. It is in Capodichino, a district of Naples. During World War I, it became a military airport in 1910. In 2023, it had 12,394,911 passengers. The airport is a base for easyJet, Ryanair, Volotea and Wizzair. == Other websites == * * * Category:1910 establishments in Italy Category:Airports in Italy Category:Naples
title: Naples International Airport
